posts.postText:
Hello,
Have you noticed the new support button on the homepage?
Well, if you EVER need an admin for server help, forum help, or anything, click that button. You will be forwarded to an online admin who can help you.
Now you don't have to look through your friends list to find someone online, you can just click that button.
Admins can come talk to me for their accounts, Sanya and I have active ones as I am writing this.
:D
really cool, but i hate it how the link for it is all over the forums. if you click on anywhere thats not already a link, you get sent to it.
